Welcome to EDAM Continuous Integration custom tool's documentation!

Description

XXX TEST XXX

This tool tests the EDAM ontology source code for semantic and syntactic consistancy. It is part of the EDAM-validation tool suite with our custom version of the ROBOT queries and reason tool.

It is primarly used for continuous integration purposes in GitHub Actions worflows in our GitHub repository and for curation purposes by the maintainer team of EDAM.

To understand EDAM and discover more about it's structure go and check out it's documentation.
